{"id":1406382968,"question_id":3380,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1727634972,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"189 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1406382968/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest Subarray With OR at Least K II","memory":"88.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumSubarrayLength(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        vector<int> cnt(31, 0);\n        const auto add = [&](int i) {\n            for (int j=31; j>=0; j--) \n                if (i & (1 << j))\n                    cnt[j]++;\n        };\n        const auto sub = [&](int i) {\n            for (int j=31; j>=0; j--) \n                if (i & (1 << j))\n                    cnt[j]--;\n        };\n        const auto sum = [&]() {\n            int s = 0;\n            for (int i=0; i<31; i++) {\n                if (cnt[i]) s += (1 << i);\n            }\n            return s;\n        };\n\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        int ans = INT_MAX;\n        for (int l=0, r=-1; l<N && r<N; l++) {\n            while (r+1<N && (sum() < k || l > r)) {\n                r++;\n                add(nums[r]);\n            }\n            if (sum() >= k)\n                ans = min(ans, r-l+1);\n            sub(nums[l]); \n        }\n        return (ans == INT_MAX ? -1 : ans);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-subarray-with-or-at-least-k-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
